fadein{0%{opacity:0}66%{opacity:0}100%{opacity:1}}.location-right-side-panel{-webkit-transform:translateX(20rem);transform:translateX(20rem);position:fixed;right:0}

<script type="application/ld+json" id="json-ld">{"@context":"http://schema.org","url":"https://www.popularmechanics.com/science/environment/a19410028/chinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results/","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Popular Mechanics"},"@type":"Article","author":{"name":"Avery Thompson","@type":"Person"},"dateModified":"2018-03-12T19:15:37.709956Z","datePublished":"2018-03-12T19:15:00Z","headline":"China's Anti-Pollution Initiative Produces Stellar Results","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","height":1414,"thumbnail":"https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&resize=100:*","url":"https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg","width":2120},"mainEntityOfPage":{"@id":"https://www.popularmechanics.com/science/environment/a19410028/chinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results/","@type":"WebPage"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&resize=100:*","articleBody":"It\u2019s no secret that Chinese cities have some of the worst air pollution on the planet. Many citizens of Chinese metropolises are forced to wear masks when they go outside, and Chinese life expectancy has suffered as a result. This crisis prompted the Chinese government to declare a \u201cwar against pollution\u201d in 2014, and according to recent data, the country appears to be winning. \n\tAdvertisement - Continue Reading Below\n\t\n\nOver the past four years, pollution in China\u2019s major cities has decreased by an average of 32 percent, with some cities seeing an even bigger drop, according to professor Michael Greenstone of the Energy Policy Institute. This decline comes after several aggressive policies implemented by the Chinese government, including prohibiting the building of new coal plants, forcing existing plants to reduce their emissions, lowering the amount of automobile traffic, and closing down some steel mills and coal mines. The result has been a dramatic reduction in fine particulates in the atmosphere, which is the primary source of air pollution.Some cities, like Beijing, have achieved even greater reductions in air pollution. Beijing has seen a 35 percent drop in particulates, while the city of Shijiazhuang saw a 39 percent drop. China has prioritized pollution reduction in these cities, with the government spending over $120 billion in Beijing alone.According to an analysis published in the New York Times, if China can keep up this pace, it could extend the lifetimes of its citizens by about 2.4 years on average. In cities with above-average reductions on their atmospheric particulates, that could translate into five years or more of life.Source: The New York Times","wordCount":268}</script>

			</a>

<header class="content-header standard-header">
	
	
	<div class="content-header-inner">
		<h1 class="content-hed standard-hed">China's Anti-Pollution Initiative Produces Stellar Results</h1>

					<h2 class="content-dek standard-dek"><p>Airborne particulates have declined by an average of 32 percent across many Chinese cities.</p></h2>
			</div>
</header>






<div class="content-container standard-container">
	<div class="standard-body">
		


<div class="content-info standard-info">
	<div class="content-info-inner">
		<div class="content-info-metadata">
										


	<div class="byline-with-image content-info-byline-with-image" data-tracking-id="recirc-byline" data-tracking-label="Avery Thompson">
		<div class="content-info-byline-image">
							
					
		
	<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view"
							src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"
		
				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/rover/profile_photos/e42a444f-d647-4a38-b032-a04e6f3bd096_1466109301.jpg?fill=1:1&amp;resize=200:*"

				
				title=""
		alt=""
	/>

		
					</div>

				<!-- shared/byline -->

	
	<div class="byline content-info-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">By
					<a href="/author/16191/avery-thompson/" class="byline-name" rel="author" itemprop="name">Avery Thompson</a>		
	</div>
<!-- / shared/byline -->

	</div>

			
						<time class="content-info-date js-date"
				  datetime="2018-03-12T19:15:00Z"
				  data-publish-date="2018-03-12T19:15:00Z"
				  data-format="MMM D, YYYY" >
									Mar 12, 2018
							</time>
		</div>

				<div class="content-info-social-buttons primary-social-buttons standard-social-buttons">
						<div class="aggregate-count content-info-aggregate-count">
	<span class="aggregate-count-number " data-social-providers="facebook twitter email"></span>
</div>


			<div class="social-button-group content-info-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-primary">
	<div class="social-button social-button-facebook content-info-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-facebook" title="Share on Facebook"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//facebook.com/v2.10/dialog/feed?display=popup&amp;link=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fscience%2Fenvironment%2Fa19410028%2Fchinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results%2F&amp;redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fscience%2Fenvironment%2Fa19410028%2Fchinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results%2F&amp;name=China%27s%20Anti-Pollution%20Initiative%20Produces%20Stellar%20Results&amp;description=Airborne%20particulates%20have%20declined%20by%20an%20average%20of%2032%20percent%20across%20many%20Chinese%20cities.&amp;picture=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fhmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fimages%2Fgettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg%3Fcrop%3D1.00xw%3A0.755xh%3B0%2C0.144xh%26resize%3D1600%3A%2A&amp;app_id=218456798186610" target="_blank" data-social-key="facebook">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-facebook"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>
<div class="social-button social-button-twitter content-info-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-twitter" title="Share on Twitter"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//www.twitter.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fscience%2Fenvironment%2Fa19410028%2Fchinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results%2F&amp;text=China%27s%20Anti-Pollution%20Initiative%20Produces%20Stellar%20Results&amp;via=PopMech" target="_blank" data-social-key="twitter">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-twitter"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

	data-tracking-id="share-button-email" title="Email"
>
	<a class="social-button-link" href="mailto:?body=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fscience%2Fenvironment%2Fa19410028%2Fchinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results%2F&amp;subject=China%27s%20Anti-Pollution%20Initiative%20Produces%20Stellar%20Results" target="_self" data-social-key="email">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-email"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

		</div>
	</div>
</div>


					






		
		
	<div class="content-lede-image standard-lede-image">
		<div class="content-lede-image-wrap">
			
					
		
	<img class="zoomable lazyload lazyload-in-view"
							src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"
		
				data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?resize=768:*"

							
																															
			data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?resize=768:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?resize=768:* 650w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?resize=980:* 768w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg?resize=980:* 980w"
		
				title="Beijing&#x20;Smog"
		alt=""
	/>

		
							
			
			<div class="image-credit content-lede-image-credit">
			<span class="image-copyright">Getty Images</span><span class="image-photo-credit">Dong Wenjie</span>		</div>
	
					</div>

									<div class="social-button-group lede-image-social-button-group" data-share-location="social-btns-content-lede-image">
	<div class="social-button social-button-pinterest content-lede-image-social-button social-share-button"
	data-tracking-id="share-button-pinterest" title="Share on Pinterest"
>
	
	<a class="social-button-link" href="//pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popularmechanics.com%2Fscience%2Fenvironment%2Fa19410028%2Fchinas-anti-pollution-initiative-produces-stellar-results%2F&amp;description=China%27s%20Anti-Pollution%20Initiative%20Produces%20Stellar%20Results&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fhips.hearstapps.com%2Fhmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fimages%2Fgettyimages-871130230-1520880122.jpg%3Fresize%3D1600%3A%2A" target="_blank" data-pin-do="nothing" data-social-key="pinterest">
		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-pinterest"></span>

		
			</a>
</div>

</div>

			</div>

		
		<div class="article-body-content standard-body-content">
			<p class="body-text">Itâs no secret that Chinese cities have some of the worst air pollution on the planet. Many citizens of Chinese metropolises are forced to wear masks when they go outside, and Chinese life expectancy has suffered as a result. This crisis prompted the Chinese government to declare a âwar against pollutionâ in 2014, and <a class="body-link" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/12/upshot/china-pollution-environment-longer-lives.html" target="_blank">according to recent data</a>, the country appears to be winning. </p><div class="breaker-ad article-breaker-ad standard-article-breaker-ad mobile-breaker-ad">
	<div class="breaker-ad-text">Advertisement - Continue Reading Below</div>
	<div id="gpt-ad-vertical-top-mobile" class="ad-container"></div>
</div>
<p class="body-text">Over the past four years, pollution in Chinaâs major cities has decreased by an average of 32 percent, with some cities seeing an even bigger drop, according to professor Michael Greenstone of the Energy Policy Institute. This decline comes after several aggressive policies implemented by the Chinese government, including prohibiting the building of new coal plants, forcing existing plants to reduce their emissions, lowering the amount of automobile traffic, and closing down some steel mills and coal mines. The result has been a dramatic reduction in fine particulates in the atmosphere, which is the primary source of air pollution.</p><p class="body-text">Some cities, like Beijing, have achieved even greater reductions in air pollution. Beijing has seen a 35 percent drop in particulates, while the city of Shijiazhuang saw a 39 percent drop. China has prioritized pollution reduction in these cities, with the government spending over $120 billion in Beijing alone.</p><p class="body-text">According to an <a class="body-link" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/12/upshot/china-pollution-environment-longer-lives.html" target="_blank">analysis published in the <em>New York Times</em></a>, if China can keep up this pace, it could extend the lifetimes of its citizens by about 2.4 years on average. In cities with above-average reductions on their atmospheric particulates, that could translate into five years or more of life.</p><p class="body-text">Source: <a class="body-link" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/12/upshot/china-pollution-environment-longer-lives.html" target="_blank">The New York Times</a></p>


			


								</div>
	</div>

	<div class="content-rail standard-rail">
					<div class="vertical-ad standard-article-vertical-ad">
	<div class="breaker-ad-text">Advertisement - Continue Reading Below</div>
	<div id="gpt-ad-vertical-top" class="ad-container"></div>
</div>

		
					
<div class="deferred-recirculation-module" data-template="#recirculation-module-template"></div>

			</div>
</div>

	data-tracking-id="share-button-facebook" title="Share on Facebook"

		<span class="icon social-button-icon icon-facebook"></span>

<script id="gallery-list-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="gallery-module">
		<% if ( !gallerySuppressTitle ) { %>
			<h2 class="title"><%= title %></h2>
		<% } %>
		<div class="gallery-list">
			<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
				<div class="list-item">
					<% if ( item.data.type == 'product') { %>
						<img class="list-product-slide-image" srcset="<%= item.data.product.image.src %>"/>
<div class="list-product-slide-info">
	<% if (item.data.product.name) { %>
		<div class="product-headline">
			<%= item.data.product.name %>
		</div>
	<% } %>
	<div class="product-slide-details">
		<% if (item.data.product.brand) { %>
			<span class="product-slide-brand"><%= item.data.product.brand %></span>
		<% } %>
		<% if (item.data.product.vendor) { %>
			<span class="product-slide-vendor"><%= item.data.product.vendor %></span>
		<% } %>
		<span class="product-slide-price"><%= item.data.product.price %></span>
	</div>
	<div class="buy-button">
		<a class="product-btn-link" href="<%= item.data.product.retailer.url %>"
			data-brand="<%= item.data.product.brand || item.data.product.brand %>"
			data-href="<%= item.data.product.retailer.url %>"
			data-price="<%= item.data.product.price %>"
			data-sem3-id="<%= item.data.product.product.sem3_id %>"
			target="_blank"
			rel="nofollow"><%= item.data.action || "SHOP NOW" %></a>
	</div>
	<% if (item.data.product.description) { %>
		<div class="slideshow-slide-dek"><%= item.data.product.description %></div>
	<% } %>
	</div>

					<% } else { %>
						<div class="list-item-image-wrap">
							<img class="list-image" src="<%= item.data.media.src %>" srcset="
								<% _.each( item.data.media.srcset, function( srcset, i ) { %>
									<%= srcset.img %><% if (i !== item.data.media.srcset.length ) { %>, <% } %>
								<% }); %>
							">
						</div>
						<div class="list-info">
						<% if ( item.data.headline ) { %>
								<div class="item-info-title"><%= item.data.headline %></div>
							<% } %>
							<% if ( item.data.dek ) { %>
								<%= item.data.dek.replace(/<p>/g, '<p class="item-info-dek">') %>
							<% } %>
						</div>
					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% }); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>

			<div class="breaker-ad transporter-vertical-ad">
	<div class="breaker-ad-text">Advertisement - Continue Reading Below</div>

</div>

												
						
																										
			













<div class="simple-item transporter-simple-item grid-simple-item-last-tablet ">
		





	




<a class="simple-item-image item-image" href="/science/environment/a19459049/geoengineered-glaciers/">
					
					
		
	<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view"
							src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"

	</a>

<script id="recirc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="recirculation-module" data-tracking-id="recirc-<%= data.feed.feed_type %>" data-tracking-label="More From <%= data.feed.title %>">
		<div class="recirculation-module-header">
			More From

			<a class="recirculation-module-feed-link" href="<%= data.feed.url %>"><%= data.feed.title %></a>
		</div>

		<div class="recirculation-module-inner">
			<% _.each( data.content, function( item ) { %>
				<div class="simple-item recirculation-module-item">
					<div class="recirculation-module-image">
						<% if ( item.image ) { %>
							<a class="full-item-image item-image recirculation-image" href="<%= item.url %>">
								
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view " data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>


								<%
	var displayTypeTitle = item.displaytype._attributes.title;
	var contentTypeTitle = item.contenttype._attributes.title;

	var contentTypeIcon = {
		"Quizzes": "quiz",
		"Video": "video"
	}[ contentTypeTitle ];

	var displayTypeIcon = {
		"Gallery": "gallery"
	}[ displayTypeTitle ];

	var acceptedContentTypes = contentTypeTitle === "Quizzes" || contentTypeTitle === "Video";
	var acceptedDisplayTypes = displayTypeTitle === "Gallery";

	var showIcons = acceptedContentTypes || acceptedDisplayTypes;
%>

<% if ( showIcons ) { %>
	<div class="content-type-icon">
		<i class="icon icon-<% if ( contentTypeIcon ) { %><%= contentTypeIcon %><% } else { %><%= displayTypeIcon %><% } %>"></i>
	</div>
<% } %>

							</a>
						<% } else { %>
							<a class="recirculation-content-indicator" href="<%= item.url %>">
								<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

							</a>
						<% } %>
					</div>

					<a class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title" href="<%= item.url %>"><%= item.title %></a>

					<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
							

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "presented-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = item.sitename,
	customLabelLong = item.sponsor.custom_label_long,
	customLabelShort = item.sponsor.custom_label_short;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Created for
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Created by <%= siteName %> for
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "presented-by" ) { %>
					Presented by
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Created by
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.brand %>
		</div>
	</div>
<% } %>

					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% } ); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="related-module-template" type="text/template">
	<a class="related-content-link" href="<%= data.url %>">
		<div class="embed-related-content" data-related-id="<%= data.id %>" data-tracking-id="recirc-editorial" data-tracking-label="<%= data.title %>">
			<div class="image-container aspect-ratio-2x1">
				<% if ( data.image ) { %>
					
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view " data-src="<%= data.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof data.image.srcset !== "undefined" && data.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= data.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

				<% } else { %>
					<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

				<% } %>
			</div>
			<div class="info-container">
				<a class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title" href="<%= data.url %>"><%= data.title %></a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</a>
</script>
<script id="content-testing-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="ct-unit">
		<div class="ct-unit-inner">
			<div class="ct-unit-text-container">
				<a class="ct-unit-heading" href="<%= body.variant_url %>">Read This Next</a>

				<a class="ct-unit-title" href="<%= body.variant_url %>"><%= body.headline %></a>
			</div>

			<a class="ct-unit-image-container" href="<%= body.variant_url %>">
				
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view ct-unit-image" data-src="<%= body.image.selectedCrop %>"
	<% if ( typeof srcset !== "undefined" && srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="gallery-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="gallery-module" data-gallery-id="<%= galleryId %>" data-gallery-slide-count="<%= data.length %>">
		<% if ( !gallerySuppressTitle ) { %>
			<h2 class="title"><%= title %></h2>
		<% } %>
		<div class="slides">
			<ul class="actions">
				<li class="previous"></li>
				<li class="next"></li>
			</ul>
			<div class="slides-inner">
				<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
					<div class="slide">
						<figure>
							<% if ( item.data.type == 'image' ) { %>
								<div class="image">
									<img data-src="<%= item.data.media.src %>" data-srcset="
										<% _.each( item.data.media.srcset, function( srcset, i ) { %>
											<%= srcset.img %><% if (i !== item.data.media.srcset.length ) { %>, <% } %>
										<% }); %>
									">
								</div>
							<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'file' ) { %>
								<div class="loop">
									<video data-src="<%= item.data.src %>" autoplay loop muted playsinline></video>
								</div>
							<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'video' ) { %>
								<div class="video">
									<iframe src="<%= item.data.src %>"></iframe>
								</div>
							<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'embed' && item.data.media.embed_type == 'youtube' ) { %>
								<div class="youtube">
									<%= item.data.media.lazy_embed_code %>
								</div>
							<% } %>
							<figcaption>
								<% if (data.length > lowSlideCount) { %>
									<p class="index"><%= i + 1 %><span class="index-text">of</span><%= data.length %></p>
								<% } %>
								<% if ( item.data.headline ) { %>
									<p class="headline"><%= item.data.headline %></p>
								<% } %>
								<% if ( item.data.dek ) { %>
									<%= item.data.dek.replace(/<img(.*?)>/g, '').replace(/<p>/g, '<p class="dek">') %>
								<% } %>
								<% if ( item.data.credit ) { %>
									<p class="credit"><%= item.data.credit %></p>
								<% } %>
								<% if ( item.data.copyright ) { %>
									<p class="copyright"><%= item.data.copyright %></p>
								<% } %>
							</figcaption>
						</figure>
					</div>
				<% }); %>
			</div>
		</div>
		<% if (data.length <= lowSlideCount) { %>
			<div class="dots">
				<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
					<div class="dot<% if (i === 0) { %> active<% } %>"><%= i + 1 %></div>
				<% }); %>
			</div>
		<% } %>
		<div class="caption"></div>
		<% if (data.length > lowSlideCount) { %>
			<div class="thumbnails">
				<ul class="actions">
					<li class="previous"></li>
					<li class="next"></li>
				</ul>
				<div class="thumbnails-inner">
					<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
						<div class="slide<% if (i === 0) { %> active<% } %>">
							<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="<%= item.data.thumb.src %>" />
						</div>
					<% }); %>
				</div>
			</div>
		<% }%>
</script>

<script id="eoc-playlist-template" type="text/template" data-section-id="20cff57c-73a0-4045-a60a-8b4e9f83cce0">
	<div class="end-of-content-playlist">
		<div class="video-header">
			<h2>Watch Next</h2>

			 data-align=""
			 data-media-id=""

			 data-size=""

	</div>

				</div>
			<script id="deferred-css-script-tag">( function( Modernizr ) {
	var d = document,
	ua = navigator.userAgent,
	reMobile = /Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/ig;

	if ( Modernizr && Modernizr.addTest ) {
		Modernizr.addTest( "mobile", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && Modernizr.mq( "only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)" );
		} );

		Modernizr.addTest( "tablet", function() {
			return reMobile.test( ua ) && !Modernizr.mobile;
		} );
	}

	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/popularmechanics/assets/css/standard-article.c5cba1b.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/popularmechanics/assets/css/standard-article-mobile.a7aca50.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( Modernizr );
</script><script id="require-js-script-tag" src="https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/popularmechanics/assets/js/dist/app/viewcontrollers/Article.fdbb244.js" async></script>
<script src="//player.popularmechanics.com/player.js" async></script>
